content.description: Take your pick of routes to the top of .50 Cal Tower, then walk off north side and cross over to Owl Tower. Climb Quarantine Crack, descend northwest and climb Pandemic Crack before walking back off and dodging snakes on your way back to the car. Bring lots of water!!
content.location: Start and end at .50 Cal Tower.

climbs.name: Covid Crack with .50 Cal Crack finish

content.description: Climb first 100' of Covid Crack, then traverse right under roof, pull around roof corner and continue trending right up cracks to the finish of .50 Cal Crack. 60 meter rope stretcher.
Follow obvious crack up .50 Cal Tower wall until climbing runs out. Build belay. Either walk off to climber's left or scramble up to climber's right and join second pitch of .50 Cal Crack.
content.location: Left-most prominent crack on wall at base of .50 Cal Tower

content.description: This is a second pitch variation/option for .50 Cal Tower. Climb right-arcing crack system 30' left of pitch 2 start for .50 Cal Crack. Ending in same belay location for .50 Cal Crack.
content.location: 30' left of .50 Cal Crack pitch 2 start

content.description: P1: Follow crack system passing a wedged .50 Cal bullet near the top to the obvious ledge almost at the end of a 60m rope.  Sling boulders and build anchor (5.7). P2: Scramble over boulders and enter left draining gulley, scramble up gulley to its top where the second pitch climbing begins with a short lie-back crack. Then step across the void to gain a face splitting crack which ends in 3rd class boulders sling-able for an anchor (5.8).
content.location: Starts at a bush just above a machine gun nest approx. 50' right of Covid Crack
